subtitle: These popular cucumber slices are filled with a ginger and pork stuffing and shallow fried, making a particularly tasty appetiser.

method.text: Scoop out the seeds and pulp from the centre of the cucumber slices.
Mix together all the stuffing ingredients. Use to stuff the cucumber centres.
Shallow fry the cucumber slices slowly on both sides until golden brown. Remove from the pan and wipe the pan clean with kitchen towel.
Mix together all the sauce ingredients and pour into the pan. Bring to a simmer and return the cucumber slices to the pan. Cover and simmer for 6 min or until the cucumber slices are tender.

Arrange the stuffed cucumber on individual serving plates. Continue to simmer the sauce over a high heat until reduced slightly. Stir in the sesame oil and coriander. Spoon sauce over the stuffed cucumbers and serve.

title: Stuffed fried cucumbers
